gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Spurs 102, Grizzlies 87
gameRecap.excerpt: The Spurs defeated the Grizzlies, 102-87. Victor Wembanyama led the way for the Spurs with 18 points, seven rebounds, six assists and seven blocks, while Julian Champagnie added 17 points (3-8 3pt. FG) in the victory. Scotty Pippen Jr. tallied 14 points, seven rebounds, five assists and four steals for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Spurs improve to 20-59 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 27-52.
